interestingcomments.content: Sunny 16 below sunset? Indoors? Night? /!/ I’m aware of the whole f16 in sun all the way down to sunset at f4 and whatnot, but what about indoor lighting? I essentially live by sunny 16 and don’t have access too a flash unit, so what should I do, say, capturing christmas lights half an hour after the sun goes down? How does this light compare to indoor lighting, and what settings would I put it for dark night, when metering for highlights or shadows? I have a camera with a lens that goes from f16 to f3.5 and a shutter that goes from 1/200 to 1/10 (I can use bulb to get lower shutter speeds).
